nodes.text: Vala Organa was a female Human duchess of House Organa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire.

In 3643 BBY, Vala convinced Muriel Corwin to pose as her dead brother, the Duke Corwin, to bolster the moral until a bounty hunter uncovered the truth. Vala was willing to make an offer, but the bounty hunter refused and killed her.
